trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_SEQ_00<tab>The nearby Resistance camp has need of help, and Eshana has a mind to send you.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Resistance captain east of Virdjala.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_TODO_01<tab>Use the Resistance cannon to destroy dharas.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_TODO_02<tab>Report to the Resistance captain.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_TODO_03<tab>Report to Eshana.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_ESHANA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, a requessst for help has come from the Resistance camp to the east. They ssseek to cull unruly dharas.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_ESHANA_000_001<tab>These creatures feed on rock; if left unchecked, they are liable to cause avalanches, thus endangering travelers.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_ESHANA_000_002<tab>Pray make hassste to the camp and report to the Resistance captain. He will furnish you with further inssstructions.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_LEADER03060_000_010<tab>Ah, you must be the adventurer they sent! You have our thanks.

TEXT_BANANA503_03060_LEADER03060_000_011<tab>As you will have heard, we seek to put down some uncommonly aggressive dharas. And to ensure that they stay down, we will strike their cores with cannon fire.

TEXT_BANANA503_03060_LEADER03060_000_012<tab>At the junction to the north, we've laid a hunk of precious ore which attracts dharas. The creatures will single-mindedly march towards it, thus exposing their vulnerable cores to the cannon we've positioned at the perch nearby.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_LEADER03060_000_013<tab>Your task is to use the cannon to destroy the dharas before they can reach the ore. Go now, and good luck!

TEXT_BANANA503_03060_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Use the cannon to destroy the three dharas. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target the core and fire with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Do not let the dharas reach the ore, or the mission will end in failure.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_LEADER03060_000_024<tab>The cannon is positioned at the perch just north of here. Hurry there and use it to destroy the dharas before they can reach the ore!
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_LEADER03060_000_027<tab>You did it! The dharas have all crumbled into the rock whence they came!
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_LEADER03060_000_028<tab>Our friends of the border guard hold you in high esteem, and small wonder. Thank you, adventurer, and please pass my regards to Eshana.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_ESHANA_000_030<tab>So the dharas are no more? Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You have done all of us a great ssservice.

TEXT_BANANA503_03060_ESHANA_000_031<tab>That Resistance camp keeps watch over the route to the Peaks. Though our companies be different, we do not hesitate to cooperate with one another for the common good.
TEXT_BANANA503_03060_LEADER03060_000_035<tab>My thanks again for your help with the dharas. Please pass my regards to Eshana.
